Name: The Disappearance of the Mitchells
About the game: The Disappearance of the Mitchells is a small indie horror game played in the ego perspective. You are playing a young man - encouraged by his friends - trying to solve the mystery of the sudden disappearance of a husband and wife, leaving their house and all of their belongings. Explore the house and search everything for clues to try and find the truth, before your fear gets the better of you.
